PositionHistory.Title: Co-Founder
PositionHistory.Description: (Travel domain) ● Product Design, Wireframe creation ● Code writing, deployment, architecture ● A/B testing, product optimization

JobCategory.Comments: User Experience describes 64% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Engineering Manager
PositionHistory.Description:
Company name: Western Union(Fintech) Technology: Python, Javascript, Salesforce, Exacttarget, Experian, Ruby on Rails(ROR), Cloud, , Java, Heroku, Amazon and Reactjs.
● Engineering Head (leading a team of 20+ engineers, designers for the mobile and webs applications, in both Agile and SDLC way) ● Interaction with product owners to create epics, user stories, sprint planning, team meeting. ● Task estimation, team velocity, and to follow project deadline. ● Define technology architecture, design and roadmap. ● Define Architecture, set up Amazon servers, CI/CD, cloud for both UAT and for the production environment. ● Assess risk as well as security, performance, and scalability ● Provide insights into software, new technology, and trends ● Work with the executive team to define goals and manage progress ● Lead software integration with partners ● Team members empowerment, set rules to go live and defining Definition of Done(DOD). ● Coordinate and communicate with the offshore team. ● Interaction with senior manager and to provide Daily/Weekly/Monthly status, to create APAC worksheet.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 63% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Engineering Head
PositionHistory.Description:
Client: Aligntech(Consumer, professional and Doctor store websites, e-commerce) Technology: Python, Javascript, Salesforce, Exacttarget, Experian, Ruby on Rails(ROR), Cloud, , Java, Heroku, Amazon and Reactjs.
● Engineering Head (leading a team of 20+ engineers, mobile and webs applications) and Scrum Master (Scrum of Scrum team) leading a cross functional team. ● Responsible for writing code, test cases (95% test coverage), peer programming and code review(Github) and to overall follow process. ● Team members empowerment, set rules to go live and defining Definition of Done(DOD). ● Coordinate and communicate with the offshore team. ● Team empowerment and to define DOD. ● Work with Devops team for the automation by using automation tools for the deployment, testing and for the repetitive process. ● Billions of records databases management through tools like Solr, Hadoop. ● Interaction with senior manager and to provide Daily/Weekly/Monthly status, to create APAC worksheet. ● Good knowledge of Digital technologies like A/B Testing configuration and SEO, SCM, Cost per click & conversation ratio. ● Platform scalability and concurrency performance. ● Facilitate sprint planning, daily scrums, retrospectives, stakeholder meetings, software demonstrations, requirements definition, design and implementation of integrations and enterprise services. ● Working with business owners to propose high-quality user experience solutions for web and mobile applications and to map requirements into technical and functional documents. ● Responsible for working with the configuration management and administration teams to provide accurate build and deployment instructions. ● SEO & SCM - Search volume & keyword selection. ● Cost per click & conversation ratio. ● Nurturing user data and increase user opts-in. ● Creating KPI dashboard and Tag Management(UTM_SOURCE), Social media (Like Facebook, Twitter) branding. ● Managing all Digital marketing tools and provide training to the Associates.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 63% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Engineering Manager
PositionHistory.Description: Java, Sinatra, BDD, Heroku, Html, JavaScript, Database Client - Posten Norge(Online postal ecommerce service) ● Drive project and program delivery. ● Responsible for ensuring project delivery on time on schedule and with quality. ● Effectively communicate with team members and stakeholders in a timely and clear fashion. ● Identify and resolve issues and conflicts within the program, projects and project management community and with other stakeholders if necessary. ● Resolve issues at the project or line level and escalate issues which cannot be resolved in a timely and accurate manner. ● Manage key stakeholders and business and technology leads. ● Manage and communicate effectively with domain leads at senior level and working level teams. ● Responsible for ensuring project steering committee meetings, cross function meetings and other key project meetings are effective and achieve objectives on a consistent manner. ● Change management. ● Responsible for to drive the adoption of agile methodology across teams. ● Responsible for to work with users to drive changes within the organization for projects implementation. ● Develop best practices and tools for project execution and management. ● Ensure utilization of standards and practices across all projects.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 41% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Senior Software Engineer
PositionHistory.Description: Client - ClearTrip ● As a scrum master facilitated daily scrum meetings, sprint planning, sprint review, and sprint retrospective. ● Worked with the business analyst to understand the business requirement, use case analysis. ● Experience working with diverse cross-functional teams. ● Work with development team, conflict resolution, team management, risk management. ● Interaction with the Product Owners to understand the project requirement and to create user story for the development(BDD, TDD), by using Agile tools like Jira. ● Enforce Agile principle such as Automation testing, Continuous integration. ● Conduct Daily stand-up call, ATDD, Sprint Planning, Retrospective. ● Manage Kanban dashboard, Burn-down chart and to find team velocity. ● Project documentation through tools like Confluence/ Wiki. ● Enabled improvement in team delivery commitments and capacity planning for sprints by identifying & tracking hidden tasks that increased customer satisfaction. ● Team empowerment and to define DOD. ● Work with Devops team for the automation by using automation tools for the deployment, testing and for the repetitive process.

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: Amit Agarwal's experience appears to be strongly concentrated in Information Technology (mostly Programming) and slightly concentrated in User Experience (mostly Web Design). Amit Agarwal has 13 years of work experience, with 8 years of management experience, including a high-level position.
sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:ManagementStory: Current position is a executive-level management role: Co-Founder Starting on 1/1/2019, the candidate held the following executive-level management position for 10 months: Title: Co-Founder for Barterfly.io Starting on 8/1/2017, the candidate held the following mid-level management position for 17 months: Title: Engineering Manager for Western Union(Fintech) Starting on 6/1/2010, the candidate held the following mid-level management position for 5 years and 2 months: Title: Engineering Manager for TATA CONSULTANCY SERVICES

sov:Findings.sov:Information: [Sovren:311;] The resume contains a contact information section that is not the first section. A resume should always include the candidate's contact info at the top of the resume.
[Sovren:213;] A street level address was not found in the contact information. A full contact address should always be included in a resume as it allows for location based searches.
[Sovren:232;DEG-2] The following educational degree is not associated with a school: DEG-2. Every degree in a resume should be associated with a school.

[Sovren:151;0,1,4] The following sections do not have the header on a separate line: 'EDUCATION', 'CERTIFICATES', 'Languages known'. Every section should have a clear, unambiguous, commonly-used header on a separate line directly above the content associated with it.

sov:ResumeUserArea.sov:ParserConfigurationString: Coverage.MilitaryHistoryAndSecurityCredentials = True; Coverage.PatentsPublicationsAndSpeakingEvents = True; Coverage.PersonalAttributes = True; Coverage.Training = True; Culture.CountryCodeForUnitedKingdomIsUK = True; Culture.DefaultCountryCode = IN; Culture.DefaultCultureIsIndia = True; Culture.Language = English; Culture.PreferEnglishVersionIfTwoLanguagesInDocument = False; Data.UserDefinedParsing = False; OutputFormat.AssumeCompanyNameFromPrecedingJob = False; OutputFormat.ContactMethod.PackStyle = Split; OutputFormat.DateOutputStyle = ExplicitlyKnownDateInfoOnly; OutputFormat.NestJobsBasedOnDateRanges = True; OutputFormat.NormalizeRegions = False; OutputFormat.SkillsStyle = Default; OutputFormat.StripParsedDataFromPositionHistoryDescription = True; OutputFormat.TelcomNumber.Style = Raw; OutputFormat.XmlFormat = HrXmlResume25
